detailsData.title: Efficient
detailsData.content: Drive efficiency into your dispute resolution process freeing you to use the uniquely human skills that are at the heart of what you do. Use technology to get the administrative task out of your way.

detailsData.title: Intuitive
detailsData.content: The user interface is intuitive, incorporating some of the techniques that mediators use when taking notes on paper. But it’s so much easier with ADR Notable to find the note you want, edit it, move it, and pop it into a term sheet.

detailsData.title: Secure
detailsData.content: Storing data in the cloud means heightened security and backups. And your case information is available wherever and whenever you need it.

detailsData.title: Collaborative
detailsData.content: Collaboration is at the heart of it all. Our platform easily allows you to collaborate with your included 'plus one', other mediators and participants. You will also appreciate the integration with Google and Outlook calendars and email.

address: 875 N. High Street, Suite 300, Columbus, Ohio 43215
subHeading: Mediation Software for Case and Practice Management
valueProp: ADR Notable's mediation software is your workbench with every tool you need. Our secure platform helps you manage every step of the mediation process.

testimonalData.text: I have been a fan of ADR Notable’s since the very first time that I saw it. As one of the leading online mediators in the country, I find that technology makes the dispute resolution process easier, more streamlined and visual for all participants including the practitioners and ADR Notable is at the top of my list!
testimonalData.author: Susan Guthrie

testimonalData.text: I found that there is a not so difficult learning curve and I know that the features will definitely be an asset for my mediation practice. Before ADR Notable, I was paying multiple subscriptions for different tools necessary to run my practice.
testimonalData.author: Roberto Garcia

testimonalData.text: ADR Notable app is a game changer for the way I manage my mediation cases. I love the clean, clear design that I can use on my iPad or any computer; using Apple Pencil in addition to a keyboard is what lets me actually give up the pen and paper.
testimonalData.author: Charlotte Parsons
